backend/main.mo: Defines actor with content types, user profiles, versioned draft/published content, access control, storage mixins, and publishing/ownership logic.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting the old actor’s stable fields to the new structure including versionPublishData.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking specific frontend files to feature requirements and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pre-written summaries for multiple frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes with global component styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and initializes active content version from URL on first load.
frontend/src/components/ContentVersionSw: UI component for switching content versions, invalidating/refetching version-scoped queries, and handling custom version input.
frontend/src/components/DraftReviewSumma: Displays draft gallery and message counts with loading states and last-loaded timestamp.
Provides draggable list UI that reorders items locally during drag and commits on drag end.
frontend/src/components/EditGuard.tsx: Gates editing behind authentication and profile setup, showing login or loading states when needed.
frontend/src/components/editors/Dedicati: Editor for updating the final dedication text, syncing with draft data and saving changes.
frontend/src/components/editors/GalleryE: React component for managing draft gallery items, supporting image upload, caption input, deletion, and drag-and-drop reordering. Uses mutation hooks to sync changes to the backend.
frontend/src/components/editors/Interact: Editor for configuring interactive surprises, allowing creation and modification of quiz questions and flip cards. Saves the combined config via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/editors/LoveMess: Tool for adding, editing, deleting, and reordering love messages with titles, previews, and full text. Synchronizes updates through dedicated mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/editors/Timeline: Editor for timeline milestones, supporting date, title, description, optional photo upload, and item reordering. Persists changes through timeline mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/FlipCard.tsx: A flip‑animation card that toggles between front and back text on click.
Image carousel with navigation, error handling, and thumbnail selection for gallery items.
frontend/src/components/GoLiveGuidance.t: Shows publishing steps and status, including share link info for the active content version.
frontend/src/components/HeartParticles.t: Generates animated floating heart particles for decorative background effects.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading and error-recovery handling.
frontend/src/components/LoveQuiz.tsx: Interactive quiz component with scoring, answer feedback, and restart functionality.
frontend/src/components/MessageEnvelopeC: Displays a message preview as an envelope card and shows the full message in a modal when opened.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that collects and saves the user's name before continuing into the app.
Provides UI to publish the current draft, view publish status, copy share links, and handle related success or error states.
frontend/src/components/PublishingCallou: Alert banner explaining that edits are drafts until the user publishes the site.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with site-wide layout, background, navigation, and footer content.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with links, mobile menu handling, and login button.
frontend/src/components/SurpriseReveal.t: Interactive button that reveals a surprise message once clicked.
frontend/src/components/TimelineMileston: Renders a timeline milestone with expandable details and optional photo handling.
frontend/src/components/ValentineSurface: Simple styled container component for consistent card-like surfaces.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on change. Supports optional admin token setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useContentVersion.ts: Zustand store for tracking the active content version with persistence and URL-based initialization. Provides hook access for reading and updating the version.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditMutations.ts: Collection of React Query mutation hooks for editing gallery items, love messages, interactive surprises, and related content. Each mutation updates backend state and refreshes draft content queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity login, managing identity state and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, content versions, and draft content from the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom pastel-themed variables, dark mode styles, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/EditContentPage.tsx: Renders the content editing interface with tabs, version switching, publishing controls, and draft content editors.
frontend/src/pages/FinalDedicationPage.t: Displays the published final dedication with loading, error, and unpublished states handled.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with a hero banner, particles, and quick navigation links to site sections.
frontend/src/pages/InteractiveSurprisePa: Displays an interactive surprise page that loads published quiz and flip‑card content, handling loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LoveMessagesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays ordered love messages in envelope cards with loading, error, and unpublished-content handling.
frontend/src/pages/MemoriesGalleryPage.t: Shows a sorted gallery of published memory items via a carousel, with support for loading, errors, and missing content.
frontend/src/pages/TimelinePage.tsx: Renders a chronological timeline of published milestones with alternating layout and handles loading, errors, and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/authzError.ts: Provides helpers to detect authorization-related errors and return user-friendly messages for various backend error patterns.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash‑routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests for the app’s versioning and guidance improvements.
